prompt_final:
WORLD STYLE PACK (use consistently): Baseline look: gritty sci‑fi gladiator arena; inked line art, tight cross‑hatching, crisp silhouettes; high contrast lighting, deep shadows, sharp rim light; materials: basalt, rusted steel, pitted chrome, chain, scarred skin; atmosphere: dust motes, steam vents, ozone haze, harsh fluorescents; palette: muted charcoal/iron with neon accents (cyan, magenta, sickly gold); camera: cinematic framing, wide establishing shots + intense close‑ups | Composition: treat each image like a comic panel: clear focal point, readable action; emphasize scale (catwalks above pits, towering gates, crowds as a blur); keep violence visceral but not gratuitous (impact, tension, consequence)

Close-up character panel: Veyl hears the crowd's hunger—head tilt, remote hand poised, mirrored respirator catching fluorescents. Subtle red warning reflections and cyan rim light. Background: guards and corridor out of focus.

Constraints: no text, no watermark.
